page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: In the shadow of Coome Hills S>E> of Hungerford is a large estate comprising three farms, Park Farm, Cold Harbour and Anvilles. The estate is equipped with a wide variety of modern machinery including tractors, trailers, combines, drills and harrows. There are many buildings including living accommodation. The estate is administered by a manager. Wheat. Barley Oilseed,Rapeand Oats are grown and cut by combine harvesters, then dried for winter storage. Grassland provides pasture for both milking cows and beef cattle. A large flock of sheep graze in the meadows, some of which are used for breeding and others fattened for eating. On the estate is a 6OO metre long private airstrip for light aircraft.
